risk-management.title: Risk Management
risk-management.contactCustomer: Contact customer to confirm transaction is operated by the person himself/active user and follow up with representative in time

risk-assistants.pleaseSelectCustomerOrSearch: Please select customer or enter keyword to search
risk-assistants.pleaseSelectCrmUserOrSearch: Please select CRM user or enter keyword to search
risk-assistants.pleaseSelectAgentOrSearch: Please select agent or enter keyword to search
risk-assistants.noSearchResult: No matching results found, please try another keyword
risk-assistants.requiredFieldsTip: indicates required fields, please select users and set time range
risk-assistants.completeConfigTip: Please complete the above configuration, then hover over the "Start Mock Test" button to use AI assistant for risk analysis
risk-assistants.pleaseEnterValidTimeValue: Please enter a valid time value
risk-assistants.tableFieldConfigDescription: The variable parameters used by the configuration assistant, such as risk threshold, analysis scope, time window, etc. These variables will be referenced during the analysis process, and at least one variable needs to be configured.
risk-assistants.title: Assistant Risk
risk-assistants.name: Assistant Name
risk-assistants.switchStatusFailed: Failed to switch risk assistant status:
risk-assistants.inputRolePlaceholder: Please enter role definition, e.g. Risk Analyst, Risk Assessment Expert, etc.
risk-assistants.inputBackgroundDescPlaceholder: Please enter background description, detailing the assistant's professional background and application scenarios
risk-assistants.taskPromptDescription: Describe in detail the specific tasks and workflows that the assistant needs to complete. The AI polishing function can help optimize expression.
risk-assistants.taskPromptPlaceholder: Please enter the assistant's task prompt, describing the specific risk control tasks to be completed...
risk-assistants.taskPromptHint: Support detailed description of task processes, evaluation criteria, output requirements, etc.
risk-assistants.assistantEnabledHint: Assistant is enabled and can be used normally
risk-assistants.assistantDisabledHint: Assistant is disabled and temporarily unavailable
risk-assistants.variableConfigDescription: Configure variable parameters used by the assistant, such as risk thresholds, analysis scope, time windows, etc. These variables will be referenced during analysis, and at least one variable needs to be configured.
risk-assistants.variableConfigNote1: • Variable Name: Can be referenced in prompts using ${variable_name}
risk-assistants.variableConfigNote2: • Data Type: Supports string, number, boolean, date types
risk-assistants.variableConfigNote3: • Default Value: Initial value of the variable, can be dynamically adjusted at runtime
risk-assistants.variableConfigNote4: • Required: Variables marked as required must provide values during execution
risk-assistants.variableConfigNote5: • At least one variable needs to be configured for assistant analysis
risk-assistants.reportConfigDescription: Configure the generation template and format of analysis reports, define the structure, style, and content organization of reports. Report template content is required.
risk-assistants.standardReportDesc: Contains basic risk analysis and recommendations
risk-assistants.detailedReportDesc: Contains in-depth data analysis and charts
risk-assistants.summaryReportDesc: Concise risk overview and key findings
risk-assistants.reportTemplatePlaceholder: Please enter report template content, supports Markdown format...
risk-assistants.reportConfigNote1: • Standard Report: Suitable for regular risk assessment, contains basic structure such as summary, analysis, recommendations
risk-assistants.reportConfigNote2: • Detailed Report: Suitable for in-depth analysis, contains detailed data charts and statistical information
risk-assistants.reportConfigNote3: • Summary Report: Suitable for executive reporting, highlights key risks and core recommendations
risk-assistants.reportConfigNote4: • Custom Template: Can completely customize report format and content structure
risk-assistants.reportConfigNote5: • Report template content is required, please describe report generation rules in detail
risk-assistants.pleaseEnterTaskPrompt: Please enter task prompt content first
risk-assistants.aiPolishNoChange: The polished content is the same as the original, the service may be abnormal, please retry later
risk-assistants.pleaseConfigureAtLeastOneVariable: Please configure at least one variable
risk-assistants.parseDataSourceConfigFailed: Failed to parse data source configuration
risk-assistants.defaultTaskPrompt: Please describe in detail the risk control assistant's tasks and workflow...
risk-assistants.getTrainingLogsFailedRetry: Failed to get training logs, please retry

risk-levels.title: Risk Levels
risk-levels.name: Level Name
risk-levels.startScoreMin: Start score cannot be less than 0
risk-levels.startScoreMax: Start score cannot be greater than 1000
risk-levels.endScoreMin: End score cannot be less than 0
risk-levels.endScoreMax: End score cannot be greater than 1000

risk-tags.title: Risk Tags
risk-tags.enterTagDescription: Please enter the tag description and explain the meaning and usage scenario of the tag
risk-tags.tagNameMaxLength: The tag name cannot exceed 100 characters
risk-tags.tagDescriptionMaxLength: The tag description cannot exceed 500 characters
risk-tags.enterTagNameExample: Please enter a risk tag name, e.g.: High Risk Customer, Suspected Fraud, Good Credit, etc.
